statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeSurveys WHERE employee_id = 100 AND satisfaction_rating >= 4;
DELETE FROM EmployeeSurveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 7 AND engagement_data ->> 'score' = 'high';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND employment_status = 'Full-time';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE emp_id = 100 AND employment_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM EngagementData WHERE employee_id = 101 AND survey_id = 5;
DELETE FROM SatisfactionRatings WHERE employee_id = 101 AND rating_value < 3;
DELETE FROM EngagementData WHERE survey_id = 200 AND employee_id = 105;
DELETE FROM responses WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales');
